question: The world's largest importer of almonds are __________.
explanation: India has now become the largest importer of almonds in the world. India, the second largest almond importer in the world in 2017, has already imported 154 million pounds till February this crop year (August 2017 to July 2018), overtaking Spain and China. Spain was the biggest almond importer in 2016-17 with 210 million pounds, while China had 150 million pound import.
